column1: Little Goat Diner////I finally made it to Little Goat! So
column2: I coincidentally happen to be in Chicago during World Series madness. It's Wednesday night
column4: and the city is buzzing with sports-fueled tension. This is exciting and all i.e. curse
column6: etc. but what is even more exciting is that the most popular and difficult to access restaurants (with no TVs) are unbelievably empty. Little Goat
column8: heck probably even The Girl & The Goat had tables a plenty--my three foodie compatriots and I strolled right on in to the first.
